info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:23PM CDT until July 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in south central Illinois... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Salem, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Helm. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois near exit 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
